mapper.select: select count(*) from vacation_apply where emp_no = #{empNo} and apply_yn = 'Y'

select vc_applyno , emp_no , vc_type , vc_startdate , vc_enddate , vc_time , vc_status from vacation_apply where emp_no = #{empNo} and apply_yn = 'Y'
and vc_startdate >= to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY') order by vc_applyno desc

select vc_applyno , emp_no , vc_type , vc_startdate , vc_enddate , vc_time , vc_status from vacation_apply where emp_no = #{empNo} and apply_yn = 'Y' and vc_startdate < to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY') order by vc_applyno desc
select count(*) from vacation_apply where vc_status = '대기'

select vc_applyno , emp_no , vc_type , vc_startdate , vc_enddate , vc_status , emp_name , team_name from vacation_apply join employee using(emp_no) join team using(team_code) where vc_status = '대기' order by vc_applyno desc
select count(*) from vacation_apply where vc_status in ('승인', '반려')

select vc_applyno , emp_no , vc_type , vc_startdate , vc_enddate , vc_status , emp_name , team_name from vacation_apply join employee using(emp_no) join team using(team_code) where vc_status in ('승인', '반려') order by vc_applyno desc
select count(*) from attendance where att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')

select att_no , emp_no , emp_name , team_name , att_date , arrive_time , leave_time , stepout_time , outwork_time , att_status from attendance join employee using(emp_no) join team using(team_code)
where att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY') order by att_no desc

select emp_no , emp_name , team_name , count(case when att_status='지각' then 1 end) AS "LATE_COUNT" , count(case when att_status='조퇴' then 1 end) AS "EARLY_COUNT"
, 21 - (count(*)) as "ABSENCE_COUNT" , count(*) as "DAY_COUNT" , sum(round((to_date(leave_time, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(arrive_time, 'HH24:MI')) * 24, 1)) AS "WORK_SUM" from attendance join employee using(emp_no) join team using(team_code) where substr(att_date, 7, 4) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') group by emp_no, emp_name, team_name order by emp_no
mapper.insert: insert into attendance ( att_no , emp_no , att_date , arrive_time ) values ( seq_attno.nextval , #{empNo} , to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY') , to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI') )
mapper.update: update attendance set att_status = case when arrive_time <= '09:00' then '정상' else '지각' end where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')
update attendance set leave_time = to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI') where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')
update attendance set att_status = '조퇴' where arrive_time <= '18:00' and emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')
update attendance set stepout_time = to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI') where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')
update attendance set outwork_time = to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI') where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')
mapper.select: select att_no , arrive_time , leave_time , stepout_time , outwork_time from attendance where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'MM/DD/YYYY')

select emp_no , nvl((select 15-sum(vc_sum)/8 from vacation_apply where vc_type = '연차' and emp_no = #{empNo}),15) as "REST_YEAR" , nvl((select 10-sum(vc_sum)/8 from vacation_apply where vc_type = '병가' and emp_no = #{empNo}),10) as "REST_SICK" , nvl((select 1-sum(vc_sum)/8 from vacation_apply where vc_type = '생리' and emp_no = #{empNo} and substr(vc_startdate, 1, 2) = to_char(sysdate, 'MM')),1) as "REST_MONTH" from vacation_apply where emp_no = #{empNo} and substr(vc_startdate, 7, 4) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') group by emp_no
mapper.update: update vacation_apply set vc_sum = case when vc_time='오전' then 4 when vc_time='오후' then 4 when vc_time='종일' then 8*(to_date(vc_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(vc_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) end where emp_no = #{empNo} and vc_enrolldate = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
mapper.select: select vc_applyno , vc_type , emp_no , vc_startdate , vc_enddate , vc_time , vc_content , origin_name , change_name , vc_enrolldate , apply_yn , vc_status , emp_name , team_name from vacation_apply join employee using(emp_no) join team using(team_code) where vc_applyno = #{vcno}
